Detailed Description

class providing data on roles providing a backend to the qcl.auth client package

Class cannot be used directly, you need to subclass it in your application service class folder

qcl_auth_role::getPermissions ( $  roleRef,
$  getNamedIds = true 
)

get list of permission (ids) that belong to a role

Parameters:
mixed $roleRef role name or id
boolean $getNamedIds If true (default), get the names of the permissions, if null, return all the whole rows , otherwise just ids
Returns:
array Array of string names or numeric ids
